title: One Bedroom Available...Move In Ready...Senior Apartments
posting_body: Independent Senior Living at The Lodge at Morgan Hill
Just 30 minutes south of San Jose, CA, The Lodge at Morgan Hill is an affordable community for seniors age 55 and above.

Independent seniors will thrive among Morgan Hills destination dining, entertainment, and recreation while living comfortably in The Lodge's spacious 1 or 2 bedroom apartment homes with abundant amenities.
Each of The Lodge at Morgan Hill's spacious 1 and 2 bedroom apartments for rent feature a patio or balcony for private outdoor space and a kitchenette prepping snacks.

Throughout this affordable community are amenities to enhance everyday living including three meals served daily in the dining room with a cozy fireplace, an arts and crafts room, a computer lab, a library, a game room with card tables, and an exercise room.
It's everything an independent senior needs to live their best life inside, while a walking path, bocce ball court, and BBQ area with dining tables are a breath of fresh air.
